Name: Voxel Shot VR
About the game: Shoot Voxel zombies in VR! Utilize an arsenal of weapons to eliminate the approaching brain-hungry zombies. Don't be fooled by their cute appearance! Resilient zombies, helicopters and huge bosses are closing in to seal your doom. Can you survive the Voxzombocalypse? Features: Annihilate hordes of cute/grotesque zombies Use all weapons at your disposal like the Minigun, Uzi, Sniper Rifle, Assault Rifle. Rocket launcher and a plethora of grenades. Survivie four stages with varying difficulty: City, Desert, Base, Airport Battle giant zombies, helicopters and tanks Eliminate an unlimited amount of blood-thirsty zombies in Endless Mode Be the highest ranking voxel zombie killer with global leaderboards ** On your first play, try out the tutorial for best enjoyment
Meta Title: Voxel Shot VR: May 19, 2017, SAT-BOX and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Voxel Shot VR? Check out the release date (May 19, 2017), developer insights from SAT-BOX, and a complete game summary.
